p:
In this work, decadal hydrological simulations and predictions
11 were produced by CLM4.5. Terrestrial water storage (TWS), including liquid and solid soil moisture, unconfined aquifer water, canopy water, snow water, river water storage, and surface water storage for wetlands and small subgrid-scale water bodies
27 , was used to illustrate the elasticity framework. Previous studies have verified that the model is able to simulate large-scale TWS dynamics reasonably
36 .
